name: Gen color triggers
description: Generate color triggers for each color channels

show-ui.name: Show UI
show-ui.description: Will the UI show ? If no, the generator options will be picked from those settings

include-builtin-color-channels.name: Include built-in color channels
include-builtin-color-channels.description: Will the color channels for the BG, G, MG, etc... will be included in the generated triggers as well

show-editor-button.name: Show editor button
show-editor-button.description: Used to make a button appear in the 'edit' tab of the editor. This is enabled by default on mobile

use-legacy-hsv.name: Use legacy HSV
use-legacy-hsv.description: This setting will determine if newly generated color triggers will have the 'Legacy HSV' option turned on or off

use-gd-grid-space.name: Use GD grid space
use-gd-grid-space.description: If enabled, it will center the given coordinate on the grid. If disabled: 1 grid unit = 30 X/Y

prettify-trigger-pos.name: Prettify trigger positions
prettify-trigger-pos.description: Instead of putting each triggers in 1 column, it will separate the number of triggers into multiple columns. The number of column is calculated with the 'For each' setting
